パッケージ xyz.mlserver.util

クラス ReflectionHelper

java.lang.Object
xyz.mlserver.util.ReflectionHelper
public final class ReflectionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
Helps you using reflection.

      @Nullable public static <T> @Nullable java.lang.reflect.Method findMethod​(@NotNull("clazz") @NotNull("clazz") java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz, @NotNull("methodName") @NotNull("methodName") java.lang.String methodName, @Nullable @Nullable java.lang.Class<?>... args)
      Find method in class.
      パラメータ:
      clazz - Class that will find method on
      methodName - Method name
      args - Class of arguments
      戻り値:
      Method if found, null otherwise

    • findMethodRecursively

      @Nullable public static <T> @Nullable java.lang.reflect.Method findMethodRecursively​(@NotNull("clazz") @NotNull("clazz") java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz, @NotNull("methodName") @NotNull("methodName") java.lang.String methodName, @Nullable @Nullable java.lang.Class<?>... args)

    • invokeMethod

      public static <T> java.lang.Object invokeMethod​(@NotNull("clazz") @NotNull("clazz") java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz, @Nullable T instance, @NotNull("methodName") @NotNull("methodName") java.lang.String methodName, @NotNull("args") @NotNull("args") java.lang.Object... args) throws java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
      Invokes method.
      パラメータ:
      clazz - Class that will invoke method on
      instance - Can be empty if static method
      methodName - Method name
      args - Arguments
      戻り値:
      Result of method
      例外:
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - If something went wrong when invoking method
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If invocation isn't allowed
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - If couldn't method find

    • invokeMethodRecursively

      例外:
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException

    • invokeMethodWithoutException

      Invokes method.
      パラメータ:
      clazz - Class that will invoke method on
      instance - Can be empty if static method
      methodName - Method name
      args - Arguments
      戻り値:
      Result of method, null if invoked method returned null or thrown error

    • getField

      public static <T> java.lang.Object getField​(@NotNull("clazz") @NotNull("clazz") java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz, @Nullable T instance, @NotNull("field") @NotNull("field") java.lang.String fieldName) throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException
      Get value in field in class.
      パラメータ:
      clazz - Class that will get field on
      instance - Can be empty if field is static
      fieldName - Field name
      戻り値:
      Value of field
      例外:
      java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - If couldn't find field
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If the operation isn't allowed

    • invokeConstructor

      @NotNull public static <T> T invokeConstructor​(@NotNull("clazz") @NotNull("clazz") java.lang.Class<T> clazz, @NotNull("args") @NotNull("args") java.lang.Object... args) throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.InstantiationException
      Invoke constructor.
      パラメータ:
      clazz - Class that will invoke constructor on
      args - Arguments for invoke constructor
      戻り値:
      Result of constructor
      例外:
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - If something went wrong when invoking method
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If invocation isn't allowed
      java.lang.InstantiationException - If can't be initialized

      the super classes and interfaces.
